title: 1.13.2怎么检测掉落物
author: 小林最牛
txt_content:
怎么检测掉落物
精确到坐标那种
版本1.13.2

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
小林最牛 发表于 2020-8-10 13:57
某一格内
/execute as @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{id:"minecraft:stone"}},x=?,y=?,z=?,dx=0,dy=0,dz=0] run say hello
xyz自己填
高频激活

replies.author: CR_019
replies.txt_content:
检测掉落物用execute as @e[type=item]，精确到坐标用xyz和dxdydz参数即可。
例：
execute as @e[type=item,nbt={Item:{id:"minecraft:diamond"}},x=1,z=1,dx=3,dz=3] run say hello
复制代码

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 你坐标要精确到某一个数还是精确到某一格内？

replies.author: 小林最牛
replies.txt_content:
爱心魔王FHC 发表于 2020-8-9 19:59
你坐标要精确到某一个数还是精确到某一格内？
某一格内

replies.txt_content:
